definition: the act of running, continually repeated over a period of time
details:
noun
- the act of running
= synonyms: run
- the act of participating in an athletic competition involving running on a track
= synonyms: track
- (American football) a play in which a player attempts to carry the ball through or past the opposing team
= synonyms: run
- the act of administering or being in charge of something
= example: the act of administering or being in charge of something
- the state of being in operation
= example: the state of being in operation
adjective
- continually repeated over a period of time
- (of e.g. a machine) performing or capable of performing
= synonyms: operative, working, functional
- executed or initiated by running
- (of fluids) moving or issuing in a stream
- of advancing the ball by running
- measured lengthwise
= synonyms: linear
